full_summary:
### ACAN: Contract for Services - LGC oKtopure High Throughput DNA Extraction Robot Repair and Maintenance

#### Contract Details

* Contract Reference: PW-22-01004251
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-23-C039
* Publication Date: August 15, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: August 30, 2022
* Expected Contract Start and End Dates: To be determined

#### Contract Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to negotiate a contract with LGC Genomics for the repair and maintenance of their oKtopure High Throughput DNA Extraction Robot. The contract includes:

* On-site repair of the pipette head and Z-axis upgrade to bring the instrument up to date for the Premier Service Contract (IR-04728)
* 1-year contract coverage for all repair costs (parts, labor, and on-site travel), including one preventative maintenance, with an option to renew the Service Agreement for an additional 2 years (maximum total contract duration: 3 years)

#### Statement of Capabilities

Any interested supplier must demonstrate their ability to meet the following requirements:

* Be an authorized dealer of the oKtopure High Throughput DNA Extraction Robot, certified to maintain, repair, and calibrate oKtopure equipment.

#### Contracting Authority

Zack Flamont, Procurement Officer, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, Western Service Centre, 300 - 2010 12th Avenue, Regina, Saskatchewan, Canada, S4P 0M3. Phone: 639 560 3462, Email: [zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca](mailto:zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca)

#### Requirements for Statement of Capabilities Submission

Suppliers interested in bidding on this contract must submit a Statement of Capabilities no later than August 30, 2022, at 14:00 (local time). The Statement of Capabilities must clearly highlight the supplier's ability to meet the requirements mentioned above. For further information, please contact the Procurement Officer listed above.

#### Crown Reserves Right to Negotiate

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.
